Articles.Content:
here's the story:

i don't remember the start of the dream. at the VAB, that rocket under construction but suddenly... a rover popped out of nowhere and suddenly toppled down the rocket. the rover's cockpit looks like it is from a part mod and was unkerbaled and there were 2 EAS command seats on the somehow long front wheel support and those kerbals on these EAS command seats were sugrat and korkah kerman. i, xaned was looking at the weird rover, then jumped off the platform and ragdolled. just to see the rover leaving. but luckily the rover drifted and stopped by the international kerbin police. sugrat and korkah were charged with vandalism

Edited October 11, 2023 by Xaned Kerman

On 10/11/2023 at 9:41 AM, Xaned Kerman said:

here's the story:

i don't remember the start of the dream. at the VAB, that rocket under construction but suddenly... a rover popped out of nowhere and suddenly toppled down the rocket. the rover's cockpit looks like it is from a part mod and was unkerbaled and there were 2 EAS command seats on the somehow long front wheel support and those kerbals on these EAS command seats were sugrat and korkah kerman. i, xaned was looking at the weird rover, then jumped off the platform and ragdolled. just to see the rover leaving. but luckily the rover drifted and stopped by the international kerbin police. sugrat and korkah were charged with vandalism

Why were the kerbals charged with vandalism? Or maybe i’m stupid.

3 hours ago, Xaned Kerman said:

cuz they destroyed the rocket

Then in that case, we'd all be notorious felons!
